EmailTemplate.name: Pivotal Support Update.Support Update - 12-7-16 #4919
EmailTemplate.subject: Can you feel the support?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Support is here for you! The Pivotal Support Portal <[[https://support.pivotal.io/]]> offers you a single, comprehensive destination with all relevant Pivotal knowledge, product updates, global support services, and more. Check out the Pivotal Support Update <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/235223108]]> to find out more.
Our Goal is to Serve Our Customers! Customer service organizations are in the midst of a transformation by redefining strategies to improve customer satisfaction on more issues than ever. In line with our vision of being the resource of where you go when you need to know: Read more about how we are shaking things up to better support you, our Pivotal customers <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/235223108-Pivotal-Support-Update-Vol-4#goal]]>.
Top Knowledge Base articles We’ve picked the top Knowledge Base articles <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/235223108-Pivotal-Support-Update-Vol-4#topten]]> that address the most sought after information and topics.
Keep up with the latest Find out the latest on Product Updates <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/235223108-Pivotal-Support-Update-Vol-4#updates]]>, Support News <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/235223108-Pivotal-Support-Update-Vol-4#news]]>, Social Media <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/235223108-Pivotal-Support-Update-Vol-4#social]]>, Events <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/235223108-Pivotal-Support-Update-Vol-4#events]]>, Meet Your Support Expert <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/235223108-Pivotal-Support-Update-Vol-4#name]]>, and Pivotal Academy’s <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/235223108-Pivotal-Support-Update-Vol-4#academy]]> newest offerings.
Head to your Pivotal Support Update <[[https://discuss.pivotal.io/hc/en-us/articles/235223108]]> for all of this and more. We value your feedback <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/PivotalSupportUpdate]]>! Let us know if there is something you would like to see in the next issue.
Kind regards, The Pivotal Support Team
